hero.description: Front-end web developer with a solid understanding of modern web technologies. Adaptable to various workflows and tech stacks, with a strong sense of responsibility and a commitment to delivering the best possible product to customers

card_2.title: Korean Course
card_2.description: Landing page promoting course for Korean language

skills.heading: Technical Skills
skills.item_1: Proficient in developing (Next.js, TypeScript) and testing (Cypress) web applications
skills.item_2: Experienced in utilizing the React ecosystem to solve state management (Redux, Zustand), form validation (React Hook Form), data fetching (SWR, Axios) and other common problems
skills.item_3: Proficient in using CSS frameworks (Tailwind, Styled Components) and UI component libraries (Chakra UI, Material UI)
skills.item_4: Experienced in writing RESTful APIs (Nest.js, TypeORM) and database maintenance (PostgreSQL)
skills.item_5: Experienced in version control systems (Git, GitHub), CI/CD workflows (Vercel, Netlify) and design tools (Figma)

card_1.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
card_1.item_1: Developed a back-office web application using Next.js and Typescript, providing inventory control, customer management, statistics overview and other functionalities for the internal team
card_1.item_2: Designed and developed RESTful APIs with Nest.js, TypeORM and PostgreSQL
card_1.item_3: Ensured application stability by writing end-to-end and integration tests with Cypress
card_1.item_4: Maintained the code base and managed CI/CD processes using GitHub and Vercel

card_2.title: Front-End Web Developer
card_2.item_1: Developed an e-commerce platform using Next.js and Typescript, providing convenient browsing, searching and checkout processes to customers
card_2.item_2: Implemented a smooth payment flow with PayPal, managing complex checkout state with Redux
card_2.item_3: Ensured application stability by writing component unit tests with Jest and React Testing Library
card_2.item_4: Managed deployment and testing workflows using Azure DevOps, and tracked important metrics and issues with PostHog
